message: Ren's paws. Two little legs pushing my face away, rejecting my affectionate gesture.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, what's wrong?"

name: 蓮
message: "...Nothing."
But he doesn't lower his paws.
What's up with him? He's never done anything like this before.
I pull back. He averts his eyes.
...Seriously, what is going on with him?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Is it because of the damage you took in Rhyme?"

name: 蓮
message: "It's nothing like that..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You sure? You're acting kinda weird."

name: 蓮
message: "I just feel a little out of it, that's all. I'm fine."
Ren...
He's never avoided talking to me like this before.

name: 蓮
message: "I'm sorry. Please don't let it bother you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, okay, but... you really are acting weird. Maybe we should find a parts shop here? They might not have any, though."

name: 蓮
message: "It's really not that big a deal."

name: 蒼葉
message: "We don't want you to break, though. This is serious, like if I was sick. Understand?"
I ruffle the fur on Ren's head.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fluffy puppy!"

name: 蓮
message: "Please don't play around."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haha, sorry, sorry!"
I laugh jokingly, but inside, I'm reeling.
I never imagined Ren pushing me away like that...
Maybe it's just because he's not feeling well, but...
...I mean, is he really okay?
My worries unassuaged, I put Ren in my bag and head to the door.
